mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENTEE( MENTEE_WANT_TO_SAY, MENTEE_MEMBER_ID, MENTEE_CONTENT_ID) VALUES( #{mentee_want_to_say}, #{mentee_member_id}, #{mentee_content_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT M.MENTOR_MEMBER_ID AS mentorMemberId, M.MENTOR_WANT_TO_SAY AS mentorWantToSay, C.CHARACTER_NICKNAME AS characterNickname, C.ITEM_LEVEL AS itemLevel, C.SERVER_NAME AS serverName, MC.MENTOR_CONTENT_ID AS mentorContentId FROM MENTOR M JOIN MENTOR_CONTENT MC ON MC.MENTOR_MEMBER_ID = M.MENTOR_MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER_CHARACTER C ON C.MEMBER_ID = M.MENTOR_MEMBER_ID
